I've got far too used to staying up late. Put a film on even though I need to be up early. Oh gaaaahd.
I'ma ridiculous idiot. To myself... "oh, get an early night, Lucy. Back to work after the holidays"... 12.10am, up in less than 6hrs, oh ok.
@agirlfollowill "I was nervous about salmonella..." - me always 🙌🏻🙏🏻
Shattered but just heard 'Eagle Eye' is on with ma man, Shia 😍
Still not in bed, however I'm on my way, ready to start my working year knackered but focused 👊🏻💪🏻🤘🏻
Still up and I have to get ready for work in just over six hours. ALL OF THE LOLS.

@KrisDeSouza smashing it! We'll all get though this. #wecandoit 👊🏻🙌🏻🤘🏻
@KrisDeSouza punch them blues in the face 👊🏻.
I also like to look at those that challenge my views or have differing views, always good to look at the world as a whole 🌱🌏
Also, those who have inspiring, influential and/or similar political views 🙌🏻 (same goes for music).
Proud of myself for following people on twitter you either make me cry with laughter and/or give me the grandest mental health advice 👌🏻🤘🏻

@seanelliottoc dreamy lil' combo.
Where's best to stream NBA games in the U.K. 🙆🏻 #nba #sixers
I used to love staying up late when I was little watching basketball with my cousin, during the Christmas break I've become obsessed again🏀
I've got too used to having an alcoholic beverage every evening this week... back on the green tea life soon though ✊🏻
Just found myself singing along to that Shawn Mendes song (Treat You Better?... '?' like I don't already know). 2016 has really done me in.
@JohnWhaiteBakes these photos are so so beautiful 🙆🏻😍
I've been watching lots of 🇺🇸 sport doc's recently, not sure why but if you're looking for one to watch 'Iverson' on Netflix is v.good 🏀
I don't think I've ever risen to the shite that comes out of some arseholes on twitter but some just push it when you're at your limit!
@KTHopkins fuck off, you attention seeking piece of shit.
Everything that's gone on this year makes my stomach turn. So sad and shit. 💔

@MattLangham depending on the location I'm hanging out for a double. Although I don't want to appear too opulent... https://t.co/knDUvDAIe5
Once again trying to find a property in London for the type of mortgage I can get... maybe I could convert a garage. That'd work...
I mean, you can't not love him... therock's photo https://t.co/5zTV1IcNyP
I loved The Royal Family and I loved Liz Smith as nana... "Could she have wafer-thin ham, Barbara?" 😔💞
Being disgustingly full and yet stuffing a choc mint down my throat to "aid digestion" 😐 #christmas
Long and lovely walk done, now football and my vegetarian Christmas dinner sandwich 👍🏻
